dcterms:creator: Jintao Ke
Xiaoran Qin
Hai Yang
Zhengfei Zheng
Zheng Zhu
Jieping Ye
dcterms:description: The CDP dataset includes trip records of ride-sharing companies in Chicago’s 77 zones every 15 minutes, from 01/09/2019 to 30/12/2019. The authors randomly select 10 × 10 grids of O-D pairs from this dataset for their experiments.
dcterms:title: Chicago Data Portal (CDP)

dcterms:creator: Wenhua Jiang
Zhenliang Ma
Haris N Koutsopoulos
dcterms:description: The SLD dataset encapsulates For-Hire Vehicle trip records in 67 Manhattan administrative zones. The authors alter temporal resolution (5/15/60-minute intervals) and sample 10 × 10 / 67 × 67 O-D pairs to gauge their model’s performance.
dcterms:title: Smart Location Database (SLD)
